code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddressForm=_ref=>{let{initialAddress,onSave}=_ref;const[address,setAddress]=useState(initialAddress||{lot:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setAddress(prevAddress=>({...prevAddress,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSave(address);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"lot",className:"form-label",children:"Lote:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"lot",name:"lot",value:address.lot,onChange:handleChange,required:true,pattern:"\\d{4}",title:"Lote deve ter 4 d\xEDgitos"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Salvar"})]});};export default AddressForm;
